SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Service Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into on this 15th day of June, 2023 at New Delhi, India, by and between:

[NAME REDACTED1], S/o [NAME REDACTED3], residing at [ADDRESS REDACTED], holder of Aadhaar No. 0000 5555 6666, PAN No. ABCDE1234I, and Mobile No. +91-9000000000, hereinafter referred to as the “[NAME REDACTED4]”;

AND

[COMPANY NAME REDACTED2][COMPANY NAME REDACTED3], a company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013, having its registered office at Plot No. 112, Sector-62, Noida, Uttar Pradesh - 201301, CIN: U12345DL2000PLC000000, represented by its Director [NAME REDACTED2], holder of Passport No. A0000000, Email: example@mail.com
, hereinafter referred to as the “[COMPANY NAME REDACTED1]”.

WHEREAS the [NAME REDACTED4] desires to avail IT development and support services from the [COMPANY NAME REDACTED1], and the [COMPANY NAME REDACTED1] agrees to provide such services subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein.

NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto agree as follows:

Scope of Services – The [COMPANY NAME REDACTED1] shall design, develop, and deliver a mobile application for the [NAME REDACTED4] in accordance with specifications provided in Annexure A.

Term – This Agreement shall remain valid for a period of 12 months commencing from 01 July 2023.

Confidentiality – Both parties agree to maintain strict confidentiality of all data shared under this Agreement, including but not limited to [DATA REDACTED], [DATA REDACTED], and financial information.

Termination – Either party may terminate this Agreement by giving 30 days’ written notice.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement on the day and year first written above.
